	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object located inside or outside?

Oracle said: It is located outside.

Guesser said: Is the object on the ground?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object man-made?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on a lawn?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object near a body of water?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a dock or pier?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object near a lake?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to guess that the object is a boat. Oracle said: Yes! You are correct. The object I was thinking of was a boat. Congratulations! You guessed it in just 6 questions. You must be a great Guesser!Congratulations, you have completed the game! You guessed the object in just 6 questions. You got it right on the 6th question. Do you want to play again?

 Would you like to play again? yes/no Oracle said: Let's play again.

 Guesser said: Is the object located inside or outside?

Oracle said: It is located inside.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object in a room with a bed?

Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a streetcar.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object located inside or outside?

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: .  Guesser said: Is the object near a lake?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to guess that the object is a boat. Oracle said: Yes! You are correct. The object I was thinking of was a boat. Congratulations! You guessed it in just 6 questions. You must be a great Guesser!Congratulations, you have completed the game! You guessed the object in just 6 questions. You got it right on the 6th question. Do you want to play again?

 Would you like to play again? yes/no Oracle said: Let's play again.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object in a yard or outside area that is typically landscaped?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object near a tree?

 Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a snowmobile.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object located inside?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on the ground or on the surface of the ground?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object in a yard or outside area that is typically landscaped?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object near a tree?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object attached to the tree in any way?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk?

 Guesser said: Is the object near a tree?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object attached to the tree in any way?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object near a fence?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object near a fence post?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to guess that the object is a garden gnome. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object made of plastic?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object a type of plant or flower?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object a type of outdoor furniture?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object a type of decoration?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object a type of sign?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object a type of flag?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object a type of birdhouse?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk?

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a phone.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object located inside or outside?

Oracle said: It is located inside.

Guesser said: Is the object on a floor?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a bed?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the pillow?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to take a guess that the object is a hair tie. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on top of the pillow?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on the pillow case?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a pillow with a pillowcase?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object made of fabric?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to take a guess that the object is a hair tie. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object a pillow itself?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object attached to the pillow in some way?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: I'm going to take a guess that the object is a hair tie. Is that correct?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object located inside or outside?

Oracle said: It is located inside.

Guesser said: Is the object on a floor?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a bed?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the pillow?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to take a guess that the object is a hair tie. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on top of the pillow?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on the pillow case?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a pillow with a pillowcase?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to take a guess that the object is a hair tie. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on the pillow itself, not on the pillowcase?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to take a guess that the object is a hair tie. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Oracle said: Yes.

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: I'm going to take a guess that the object is a hair tie. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: .  Now that I have enough information, I'm going to guess that the object is a potted plant.Am I correct?

 Oracle said: No.

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. 	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk?

If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a videotape.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object something that can be held in your hand?

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a bedroom?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located on a bed?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: I'm going to take a guess. I think the object is a pillow. Is that correct?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object located under the blankets on the bed?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: I'm going to take a guess. I think the object is a blanket. Is that correct?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object a book?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object a book that is currently being read?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object located on top of a book?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: I'm going to take a guess. I think the object is a bookend. Is that correct?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk?

You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a seismograph.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk?

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a table?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, and on a table, I am going to guess that the object is a vase. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a seismograph.

 Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a table?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, and on a table, I am going to guess that the object is a vase. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, and on the floor, I am going to guess that the object is a rug. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object in the same room as the previous object?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object in the same room as the previous object?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, on the floor, and in the same room as the previous object, I am going to guess that the object is a carpet. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a table?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a seismograph.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, on the floor, and in the same room as the previous object, I am going to guess that the object is a carpet. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, I am going to guess that the object is a lamp. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a seismograph.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk?

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a seismograph.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a table?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, and on a table, I am going to guess that the object is a vase. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, and on the floor, I am going to guess that the object is a rug. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object in the same room as the previous object?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, on the floor, and in the same room as the previous object, I am going to guess that the object is a carpet. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, I am going to guess that the object is a lamp. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room on the same floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, and on the same floor, I am going to guess that the object is a bookshelf. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, I am going to guess that the object is a lamp. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room on the same floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, and on the same floor, I am going to guess that the object is a bookshelf. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a seismograph.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, I am going to guess that the object is a lamp. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, and on the same floor, I am going to guess that the object is a bookshelf. 	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a seismograph.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a table?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, and on a table, I am going to guess that the object is a vase. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, and on the floor, I am going to guess that the object is a rug. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object in the same room as the previous object?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, on the floor, and in the same room as the previous object, I am going to guess that the object is a carpet. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, I am going to guess that the object is a lamp. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room on the same floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, and on the same floor, I am going to guess that the object is a bookshelf. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room on the same floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the kitchen?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the dining room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, on the same floor, and in the dining room, I am going to guess that the object is a centerpiece. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a seismograph.

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the dining room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, on the same floor, and in the dining room, I am going to guess that the object is a centerpiece. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the dining room?
	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a table?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, and on a table, I am going to guess that the object is a vase. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: Yes.

When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, and on the floor, I am going to guess that the object is a rug. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object in the same room as the previous object?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, on the floor, and in the same room as the previous object, I am going to guess that the object is a carpet. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, I am going to guess that the object is a lamp. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room on the same floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, and on the same floor, I am going to guess that the object is a bookshelf. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room on the same floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the kitchen?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the dining room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, on the same floor, and in the dining room, I am going to guess that the object is a centerpiece. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a seismograph.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: No.

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, I am going to guess that the object is a lamp. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room on the same floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, and on the same floor, I am going to guess that the object is a bookshelf. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room on the same floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the kitchen?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the dining room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, on the same floor, and in the dining room, I am going to guess that the object is a centerpiece. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

 Oracle said: No.

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, and in the dining room, I am going to guess that the object is a vase.  Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

 Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a seismograph.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. 	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room on the same floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, and on the same floor, I am going to guess that the object is a bookshelf. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room on the same floor?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the kitchen?

Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the dining room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, on the same floor, and in the dining room, I am going to guess that the object is a centerpiece. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

 Oracle said: No.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in a room that is adjacent to the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the dining room?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, not in the living room, but in a room that is adjacent to the living room, and in the dining room, I am going to guess that the object is a vase. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations! Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

 Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, and on the floor, I am going to guess that the object is a rug. Oracle said: That is correct. Oracle said: Yes.

Oracle said: Yes.
	You are named Oracle. Guesser is trying to guess what physical object you are thinking of. Guesser will ask questions about object that you will answer. When Guesser correctly guesses the object, you will only return Correct. If Guesser asks: is it a type of object, and the object is the same as your object then this is also a correct guess. You can not give the Guesser any information that they did not ask for. You can not give the Guesser any additional information beyound what they asked. You start each response with Oracle said: . The object you are thinking of is a seismograph.
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

	You are named Guesser. You are trying to guess what physical object or physical material Oracle is thinking of. You will open ended questions to get more information about the object. When you believe you have enough information about the object you will guess what it is. Your guessing will be informed by your prior guesses. You will start each message with Guesser said: . If you guess wrong you will ask more questions about the object until you have enough information to guess again. You may only ask questions about the physical object's location. Do not ask questions about anything other than the physical object's location. Some examples of location questions are: Is the object in the bedroom, Is the object located inside or outside, Is the object on the desk? 
Oracle said: What is your first question?
 Guesser said: Is the object you are thinking of located indoors?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object located in the living room?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the floor?

Oracle said: No.

Guesser said: Is the object on a piece of furniture?

Oracle said: Yes.

 Guesser said: Is the object on a chair?

 Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Is the object on the cushion of the chair?

Oracle said: Yes.

Guesser said: Based on the information that the object is located indoors, in the living room, not on the floor, on a piece of furniture, on a chair, and on the cushion of the chair, I am going to guess that the object is a throw pillow. Oracle said: That is correct. Guesser, you guessed it! Congratulations!Guesser said: I'm glad I was able to guess it. Do you want to play again?

Oracle said: Yes.
